ruleset.name: Apex Modifiers Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex modifier standards

rule.name: TestClassIsParallel
rule.message: Test classes must have @IsTest(IsParallel=true) annotation to enable parallel test execution
rule.description: Test classes must include IsParallel=true in their @IsTest annotation to enable parallel test execution. This improves test performance by allowing tests to run in parallel, reducing overall test execution time and improving developer productivity.
